snippet.title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Official Trailer #Fuga #FugaMelodiesOfSteel
snippet.description:
Fuga: Melodies of Steel, a brand-new RPG by CyberConnect2, released to critical acclaim on July 29, 2021! 

◆Deluxe Edition
Nintendo Switch™ https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/fuga-melodies-of-steel-switch/#add-on-content
PlayStation®4/PlayStation®5 https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4726-PPSA03479_00-7600636102643568/
Steam https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/21136/_/
Xbox One/Xbox Series X|S https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/fuga-melodies-of-steel-deluxe-edition/9nvbmf0bjbdm?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
Epic Games Store https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/fuga-melodies-of-steel--deluxe-edition

◆Standard Edition
Nintendo Switch™  https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/fuga-melodies-of-steel-switch/
PlayStation®4/PlayStation®5 https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4726-CUSA24967_00-FUGA000000000000/
Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1357860/_/
Xbox One/Xbox Series X|S https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/Fuga-Melodies-of-Steel/9NLX3GWW0HF1#activetab=pivot:overviewtab
Epic Games Store https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/p/fuga-melodies-of-steel

One fateful night, a peaceful village is thrown into the flames of war. Determined to save their families captured by the Berman Army, a group of children hops aboard a giant tank, the Taranis. They make their way through the country, fighting against the Berman Army as they search for their families.

Fuga: Melodies of Steel is the newest installment in the Little Tail Bronx series such as previous titles like Tail Concerto and Solatorobo: Red the Hunter, which are set within same world inhabited by Caninu and Felineko.

-Details-
Title: Fuga: Melodies of Steel
Genre: RPG
Platforms: PlayStation®4, PlayStation®5, Nintendo Switch, Steam, Epic Games Store, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S
Languages: Japanese, English, French, Spanish, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese
Voices: Japanese, French
Release Date: July 29, 2021
Developed and Published by: CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.

◆Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Official Website: https://www.cc2.co.jp/fuga/en
◆Fuga: Melodies of Steel - PV: https://youtu.be/CbjXMMH0JzI
◆Fuga: Melodies of Steel - Official Twitter: @Fuga_CC2 https://twitter.com/Fuga_CC2

© CyberConnect2 Co., Ltd.
